message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am proposing a price of $1100000 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was hoping to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product, I propose a price of $1050000.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I see you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I've considered your request and am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $1075000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Considering the value you see in the product and your previous offers, I am willing to sell it to you for $1087500.
I understand you're willing to sell, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to sell the product to you for $1093750.
I'm getting close to walking away, but I'll make one more offer. I'm willing to pay $1012500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
